sentences.en: a huge investment of time and effort
sentences.cn: 时间和精力的大量投入

sentences.en: A small-screen portable TV can be a good investment.
sentences.cn: 小屏幕的便携式电视机很值得买。

sentences.en: As an investment, bricks and mortar are not what they were.
sentences.cn: 作为一种投资，房产不再是从前意义上的房产。

sentences.en: He bought an investment property for $100,000 and put down $20,000.
sentences.cn: 他以10万美元买下一处投资性地产，并支付了2万美元的定金。

sentences.en: He visited Thailand and Singapore to tout for investment.
sentences.cn: 他访问了泰国与新加坡，以期招揽投资。

sentences.en: If we don't put money in we will lose our investment.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不再投入资金，我们会失掉本金。

sentences.en: Investment could dry up and that could cause the economy to falter.
sentences.cn: 投资可能会中断，而这会引起经济衰退。

sentences.en: Investment is up by 5.7% after adjustment for inflation.
sentences.cn: 针对通货膨胀作出调整之后投资上升了5.7%。

sentences.en: It can be done without following some absurd, off-the-wall investment strategy.
sentences.cn: 不用遵照那套荒唐愚蠢的投资策略也可以做到。

sentences.en: Jenkins would reward all investors, no matter when they made their investment.
sentences.cn: 无论投资人何时投资，詹金斯都会让他们得到回报。

sentences.en: Savings schemes are the best retail investment products on offer.
sentences.cn: 储蓄方案是现有的最佳零售投资产品。

sentences.en: The evidence that such investment promotes growth is strong.
sentences.cn: 有充分的证据表明这种投资能够促进增长。

sentences.en: The job needs someone with a good track record in investment.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要有良好投资业绩的人来担当。

sentences.en: The value of his investment has risen by more than $50,000.
sentences.cn: 他投入的资本已经增值了5万多美元。

sentences.en: They are borrowing just to stay afloat, not for investment.
sentences.cn: 他们借钱只为了周转，而不是投资。

sentences.en: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.cn: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

sentences.en: When selecting boots, fine, quality leather will be a wise investment.
sentences.cn: 在挑选长筒靴的时候，购买上等的好皮靴将是明智的选择。
